title: Topo4D Extension
description: STAC Topo4D Extension for STAC Items and STAC Collections.

oneOf.$comment: This is the schema for STAC Items. Remove this object if this extension only applies to Collections.

allOf.$comment: Require fields here for Item Properties.

assets.$comment: This validates the fields in Item Assets, but does not require them.

oneOf.$comment: This is the schema for STAC Collections.

anyOf.$comment: This is the schema for the top-level fields in a Collection. Remove this if this extension does not define top-level fields for Collections.
This validates the fields in Collection Assets, but does not require them.
This is the schema for the fields in Item Asset Definitions. It doesn't require any fields.
This is the schema for the fields in Summaries. By default, only checks the existence of the properties, but not the schema of the summaries.

require_any_field.$comment: Please list all fields here so that we can force the existence of one of them in other parts of the schemas.

fields.$comment: All fields defined here can be used in different contexts. Item Properties fields are prefixed with 'topo4d:'. Collection Summary fields are not prefixed and include num_items, timestamp_list, temporal_resolution, and attribute_list.

topo4d:native_crs.description: The spatial reference to apply to the data, e.g., 'epsg:32634' (Item Property - REQUIRED)

topo4d:data_type.description: The type of data, e.g., lidar, image, text (Item Property - REQUIRED)

topo4d:tz.description: The timezone of the data (Item Property)

topo4d:sensor.description: The sensor used for data acquisition, e.g., Zenmuse L2, Camera (Item Property)

topo4d:acquisition_mode.description: The mode of acquisition, e.g., ULS, UPH, TLS

topo4d:duration.description: The duration of the acquisition in seconds

topo4d:trajectory.description: Flight trajectory with timestamps. UAV only.

topo4d:scan_positions.description: List of scan positions (X, Y, Z)

topo4d:orientation.description: The orientation of the scan, e.g., nadir, oblique angles

topo4d:avg_point_density.description: Average point density with given radius

topo4d:spatial_resolution.description: The spatial resolution, e.g., sampling interval

topo4d:measurement_error.description: System error during measurement or sensor accuracy

topo4d:trafometa.description: An object including all relevant meta information for transformation

reference_epoch.description: Link to another item or resource representing the reference epoch

registration_error.description: Exists if it's a co-registered point cloud

affine_transformation.description: A 4x4 or 3x4 matrix representing the affine transformation. Given as a numpy array.

rotation.description: A 3x3 matrix specifying the rotation to apply

translation.description: A vector specifying the translation to apply

reduction_point.description: A translation vector to apply before applying rotation and scaling

topo4d:product_info.description: Exists if this item is a generated product

timestamp_list.description: List of datetime values (Collection Summary field)

temporal_resolution.description: Temporal resolution of multiple acquisition, e.g., monthly, weekly, 1hr (Collection Summary field)

attribute_list.description: List of attributes, e.g., [intensity, R, G, B, cls_label] (Collection Summary field)

datetime.description: The date and time of the item (ISO 8601 format) (Item Property - REQUIRED)

^(?!topo4d:).$comment: Above, change `template` to the prefix of this extension
